ygData.subject: Re: Clothing
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye, I agree.  I heard there was a list of robes out there somewhere that tells us what colors and types there are. I once directed a poor lost Erudite to get
ygData.messageBody:
Aye, I agree. I heard there was a list of robes out there somewhere
that tells us what colors and types there are. I once directed a poor
lost Erudite to get a green robe...he traveled all the way across
country just because he liked the color green.

I'm hunting for the glowing purple robes I've seen some Wizards with.
Another wiz once told me he got his from a GM after he died. :(

--LimDul
High Elf Wiz 11th
Veeshan


>From: "Billy Sun" <bsun@...>

>Subject: [eq_wizards] Clothing

>How about clothing? What other kind of clothing a wizard can have?
I tired of red and puple robe.
>
>Maestra
